messages.title: Experience and Commitment
messages.content: I was privileged to represent this constituency for over 30 years and I have always put our community first.

messages.title: Tactical Voting
messages.content: In 2015, the general election saw a Labour MP elected here for the first time in decades. This would not have happened if Conservative, Green and UKIP voters had lent me their votes. Now we have another chance to stop the election of a Labour MP, but only if enough people vote for me.

messages.title: Local Residents' Feedback
messages.content: I have been told by so many local residents that they are fed up with the Labour Party around here. The only way to get rid of Labour is to lend your vote to me.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The only way to get rid of Labour is to lend your vote to me.

community.content: I have led campaigns for schools, hospitals and transport and have helped tens of thousands of local people when they need it.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have led campaigns for schools, hospitals and transport and have helped tens of thousands of local people when they need it. I want to do this again - for all the people all the time. I am proud of my record and have enclosed my personal biography for your consideration. I hope you will now be able to support me on 8th June.

examples: In 2015, the general election saw a Labour MP elected here for the first time in decades.
I have led campaigns for schools, hospitals and transport and have helped tens of thousands of local people when they need it.
I was privileged to represent this constituency for over 30 years and I have always put our community first.
I have been told by so many local residents that they are fed up with the Labour Party around here.
The only way to get rid of Labour is to lend your vote to me.
I want to do this again - for all the people all the time.
I have always been prepared to work across party lines for the benefit of our community.
In 2015, the general election saw a Labour MP elected here for the first time in decades.

personalStories.story: I have led campaigns for schools, hospitals and transport and have helped tens of thousands of local people when they need it.

examples: Labour’s Neil Coyle has spent much of the last two years on internal party infighting.
Labour incumbent who let many people down.
